title: Eggs Benedict
description: Classic breakfast dish with poached eggs, ham, and hollandaise sauce on an English muffin.
preparation: Heat water with vinegar, but do not boil.
Crack eggs into a cup and gently slide them into the water.
Poach eggs for about 3â€“4 minutes, then remove and drain on a paper towel.
Halve muffins, spread with butter, and toast in a pan.
Briefly fry ham in the pan.
Serve muffins with ham, poached eggs, and hollandaise sauce.
